subject: p13896515
History: Year old man with sCHF, EF , admitted for CHF exacerbation. Now with rising creatinine and decreased urine output, please eval for interval change in edema and effusions.
Impression: In comparison to radiograph, there has been decrease in the severity of the pulmonary edema with residual mild edema remaining. Moderate left pleural effusion and adjacent left retrocardiac atelectasis and or consolidation have slightly worsened. No other relevant change.
